comments.author: Durzan.4603
comments.body:
I am still working with the /v2/traits/ endpoint and I found a inconsistency at the trait icons.

All trait icons own a black background but the specialisation reaper of necromancer. They own a transparent background.

I think it would be the best if every trait icon would own the transparent background.

You can see the transparent background for example at the minor trait Shroud Knight (id 1905).

[img]https://render.guildwars2.com/file/ECDE960B19500BC40843C89041CD0C1A3A06B05A/1012579.png[/img]
